00047     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00048     bool PagingLandScapeTexture_InstantBaseTextureShadowed::isMaterialSupported()
00049     {
00050                 if (mParent->getOptions()->NumMatHeightSplat > 3)
00051                         return true;
00052                 else
00053                         return false;
00054     }
00055     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00056     PagingLandScapeTexture_InstantBaseTextureShadowed::PagingLandScapeTexture_InstantBaseTextureShadowed(PagingLandScapeTextureManager *textureMgr) 
00057         :
00058                 PagingLandScapeTexture(textureMgr, "InstantBaseShadowed",1, false)
00059         {
00060                 mIsShadowed = true;

00067     //-----------------------------------------------------------------------
00068     void PagingLandScapeTexture_InstantBaseTextureShadowed::_loadMaterial()
00069     {
00070             if (mMaterial.isNull())
00071         {
00072                         PagingLandScapeOptions * const opt = mParent->getOptions();
00073 
00074             const String filename  = opt->LandScape_filename;
00075             const String extname   = opt->TextureExtension;
00076             const String groupName = opt->groupName;
00077 
00078             const String commonName = StringConverter::toString(mDataZ) + 
00079                                         String(".") +
00080                                         StringConverter::toString(mDataX);
00081             const String matname = String("InstantBase.") + commonName + filename;
00082             const String texname = filename + ".Base." + commonName + ".";
00083 
00084             String finalTexName;
00085             if (opt->Deformable &&
00086                 ResourceGroupManager::getSingleton().resourceExists(groupName, 
00087                                                 texname + "modif." +extname))
00088             {
00089                 finalTexName = texname + "modif." + extname;             
00090             }
00091             else
00092             {
00093                 finalTexName = texname + extname;
00094             }
00095 
00096             // check need of material loading
00097             mMaterial = MaterialManager::getSingleton().getByName(matname);
00098             if (mMaterial.isNull())
00099             {
00100                 MaterialPtr templateMaterial;
00101                 if (opt->VertexCompression && opt->hasFragmentShader)
00102                 {
00103                     templateMaterial = MaterialManager::getSingleton ().
00104                         getByName (String ("InstantBaseShadowedDecompress"));
00105                     
00106                         // Create a new texture using the base image
00107                         mMaterial = templateMaterial->clone(matname, true, groupName);    
00108 
00109                     Pass *p = mMaterial->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0);
00110                     bindCompressionSettings (p->getVertexProgramParameters());
00111                     bindCompressionSettings (p->getShadowReceiverVertexProgramParameters ());
00112 
00113 
00114                     const String texname (filename +  ".HSP." + commonName + "." + extname);  
00115                     mMaterial->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->getTextureUnitState(2)->setTextureName (texname);
00116                     mPositiveShadow = true;                   
00117                 }
00118                 else
00119                 {
00120                     templateMaterial = MaterialManager::getSingleton().getByName(String ("InstantBaseShadowed"));
00121 
00122                             // Create a new texture using the base image
00123                             mMaterial = templateMaterial->clone (matname, true, groupName);
00124 
00125                     mShadow.load(filename +
00126                                     ".HS." +
00127                                     commonName + "." +
00128                                     extname, 
00129                                     groupName); 
00130                     const unsigned int mTextureSize = mParent->mPageSize * opt->TextureStretchFactor;//mShadow.getHeight();
00131                     uchar *lightdata = new uchar [mTextureSize*mTextureSize];
00132                     mLightImage.loadDynamicImage (lightdata, 
00133                                             mTextureSize, 
00134                                             mTextureSize, 
00135                                             1, 
00136                                             PF_L8, 
00137                                             true); 
00138                     computeLightMap();     
00139                     finalTexName = filename +  ".L." + commonName + "." + extname;
00140                                         
00141                                         // debug only save.
00142                     //mLightImage.save(finalTexName);
00143 
00144                     mLightTexture = TextureManager::getSingleton().loadImage(finalTexName, 
00145                                     groupName,
00146                                     mLightImage);
00147                     mLightBuffer = mLightTexture->getBuffer ();
00148                       
00149                     mMaterial->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->getTextureUnitState(2)->setTextureName (finalTexName);
00150                     
00151 
00152                 }   
00153                
00154                     // assign this texture to the material
00155                 loadColorTexture(finalTexName, 0);
00156                     mMaterial->getTechnique(0)->getPass(0)->getTextureUnitState(0)->setTextureName (finalTexName);
00157             
00158             }
00159             else
00160             {
00161                 loadColorTexture(finalTexName, 0);
00162             }
00163            
00164         }
00165     }
